description:
If you're a huge football fan, this is the app for you! Football Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores for all 32 professional teams.  It’s like getting 32 apps in one!  
You can easily switch between teams to get the latest info for each one.  Included in the app are Arizona, Atlanta, Baltimore, Buffalo, Carolina, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Green Bay, Houston, Indianapolis, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Miami, Minnesota, New England, New Orleans, New York G, New York J, Oakland, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, San Diego, San Fransisco, Seattle, St. Louis, Tampa Bay, Tennessee and Washington.

Each team has its own chat room where you can discuss the latest news and highlights with other fans.  Make sure your voice is heard! There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with your favourite football teams. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Football Fans today! 

** Brighthouse Labs and the Football Fans application are in no way associated with the NFL.  All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
